venue.name: Blackstone River Bikeway - John Street Parking Area

item.description:
Ok, here is the updated meet-up details:

We'll meet at the John Street Parking lot along the Blackstone River Bikeway (visit the numerous sites online - they're helpful with directions!).

John St. Parking
From Route 146
Take exit for Route 123 Breakneck Hill Road
Follow Route 123. It will become Great Road, then Front St. and eventually John St.
Parking is north of MM7.5 on the bikeway
There is limited parking at this location

We'll meet at the parking lot and do an 'out-and-back' ride (between 10-20 miles round trip depending on the group's comfort level). The last time we went out there we ended up riding through Woonsocket to a small pavilion with restrooms and a snack bar (water refills!).

Afterwards will go over to a nearby italian restaurant with awesome pizza (can't find the name of that place...help me out guys...Angelo's??)
item.name: Blackstone River Bikeway - Fall Colors
